settings.title: Exploration of your peace of mind.

settings.editor:
Relax in the "Beautiful maria" Suite. Do not miss anything - all that you need for happiness is here. 

Complete calm, really too beautiful to leave it. If only there were not your curiosity about the 7132 Thermal Baths and the mountain landscape!

Some of the breakfast/supper meals menu available for your suite meal order
(note: suite lunch order is not available)
Two Eggs, Crispy Potato, Tomato Jam, House Made Sausage or Bacon, Toasted House Made Bread
Millet, Chia, Almond Milk, Caramelized Bananas, Toasted Almond, Cinnamon, Brown Sugar

Apples, Labneh Cheese, Lemon Vinaigrette
Add Grilled Chicken, Scallops or Smoked Salmon

tabs.tab_content: We would ask guests to respect the fact that all our rooms are no-smoking rooms. We reserve the right to charge an exceptional flat-rate cleaning fee of $180 if there is smoking in the room.

Children up to age 5 spend the night free in their parents’ room. We charge $50 per night for each additional bed for children up to age 12, and $150 per night for each additional bed for children from age 13. Additional beds are only available in the hotel.
We are glad to welcome your four-legged friend to our Eurath Hotel. The charge is $25 per night. Please, send us inquiry for pets other then dogs or cats.
Just drive by. Our valet parking service will take care of your car. On request we can provide covered garage spaces for $25 per night.

Suite is available for from 2 PM on the day you arrive. If you arrive earlier, you can use the thermal baths right away. Please vacate your room by 11:30 AM on the day you leave - you still have use of the thermal baths on this day.

Reservation canceling is free of charge up to 48 hours before arrival. In the event of cancellation at short notice, one night is charged if we are unable to fill the room with another booking. Applicable in the event of early departure. At Christmas / New Year the cancellation period is 14 days before arrival.

settings.editor: "I would never believe anyone trying to describe or explain what an experience is to stay in this suite. Once I stayed with my husband in "Beautuful Maria", I'm returning every year, for 8 years now ... "
Browse through our beautiful  showcase of sights around town.
